trans-unit.source: Allows a custom control to prevent the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event from being sent to its parent container.
trans-unit.target: 방지 하기 위해 사용자 지정 컨트롤을 사용 하면는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> 부모 컨테이너에 전송 되는 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: You will want to use HandledMouseEventArgs primarily when developing a control that needs to handle mouse wheel events itself, and prevent them from being seen by the control's immediate parent container.
trans-unit.target: 자체 마우스 휠을 이벤트를 처리 하 고 컨트롤의 직계 부모 컨테이너에서 나타나지 않도록 하는 컨트롤을 개발 하는 경우에 주로 HandledMouseEventArgs를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: HandledMouseEventArgs is not passed directly by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventHandler> when it handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> event.
trans-unit.target: HandledMouseEventArgs로 직접 전달 되지 않거나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventHandler>처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventHandler> uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs>, which you must cast to a HandledMouseEventArgs in order to cancel an occurrence of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>.
trans-unit.target: 대신, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventHandler>a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> 의 발생을 취소 하기 위해 HandledMouseEventArgs를 캐스팅 해야를</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> 사용 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified mouse button, number of mouse button clicks, horizontal and vertical screen coordinates, and the change of mouse pointer position.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"> </xref> 가로 및 세로 화면 좌표와 마우스 포인터 위치를 변경 하 여 마우스 단추 수가 지정 된 마우스 단추를 사용 하 여 클래스 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> values indicating which mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> 누른 마우스 단추를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of times a mouse button was pressed.
The x-coordinate of a mouse click, in pixels.
The y-coordinate of a mouse click, in pixels.
A signed count of the number of detents the wheel has rotated.
trans-unit.target: 부호 있는 숫자 휠의 회전 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified mouse button, number of mouse button clicks, horizontal and vertical screen coordinates, the change of mouse pointer position, and the value indicating whether the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"> </xref> 된 지정된 마우스 단추, 마우스 단추 클릭 수, 가로 및 세로 화면 좌표, 마우스 포인터 위치 이벤트 처리할지를 나타내는 값을 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> values indicating which mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> 누른 마우스 단추를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of times a mouse button was pressed.
The x-coordinate of a mouse click, in pixels.
The y-coordinate of a mouse click, in pixels.
A signed count of the number of detents the wheel has rotated.
trans-unit.target: 부호 있는 숫자 휠의 회전 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이벤트가 처리 됩니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether this event should be forwarded to the control's parent container.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 부모 컨테이너에이 이벤트를 전달할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mouse event should go to the parent control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>마우스 이벤트는 부모 컨트롤;으로 이동 해야 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
